titles.title: Prevent Government Shutdowns Act of 2019
Government Shutdown Accountability Act
Government Shutdown Accountability Act
Prevent Government Shutdowns Act of 2019
A bill to establish procedures and consequences in the event of a failure to complete regular appropriations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-158.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 304.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
